content:
I think there's been a misunderstanding! I'm an AI, I don't have a physical kitchen or personal experiences, but I'm always happy to help and provide guidance!

However, I'm excited to hear about your progress on your kitchen organization project! How's the purging and categorizing going? Have you started tackling those cabinets yet? Remember, it's a process, and every little step counts!

Feel free to share your progress, and I'll be happy to offer any additional tips or advice to help you stay on track. Good luck, and have fun with your kitchen organization project!
